strapiPost.title: Business Leaders Gather In Rogers For Third Annual Unity Conference
strapiPost.content:
Business leaders, educators, students, and area residents will gather this week for the third annual Unity Conference, engaging in conversations about diversity, equity, and inclusion and opening doors to career opportunities for upcoming graduates from underrepresented communities. 

  • On the mic: Attendees of the event will hear from Unity Conference founder John Gaiters, speakers like Netflix Chief Talent Officer Sergio Ezama and former sports broadcaster Danyelle Musselman, along with panelists from major brands like Walmart, Netflix, P&G, Kelloggâ€™s, and The Ad Council.
  • Forging connections: The organization will also host college students from historically black colleges and universities in Central Arkansas as a way to connect brands with diverse talent.

The conference will take place Apr 26-27 at Embassy Suites in Rogers. See the full schedule of speakers and reserve your tickets HERE.
